thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core

Class Face3

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Face3
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Face4

    public class Face3
extends java.lang.Object
    Face3 represent the triangular sides (A, B, C) of the geometric object. 
     Vector3 normal = new Vector3( 0, 1, 0 ); 
 Color color = new Color( 0xffaa00 );
 Face3 face = new Face3( 0, 1, 2, normal, color, 0 );
    Author:
    thothbot
